io.robusta.rra.client

Class JdkRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.robusta.rra.client.AbstractRestClient<java.net.HttpURLConnection>
      • io.robusta.rra.client.JdkRestClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestClient<java.net.HttpURLConnection>

    public class JdkRestClient
extends AbstractRestClient<java.net.HttpURLConnection>
    Simple REST Http client wrapping the JDK Client. Compare to Apache, many JVM have this client. Created by Nicolas Zozol for Robusta Code
    Author:
    Nicolas Zozol
